it.luca.TwitterFilter.core

Class Twitter4JSearchTweets

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.luca.TwitterFilter.core.Twitter4JSearchTweets

  • public class Twitter4JSearchTweets
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows users to search Tweets that match the message given in input
    Author:
    lucafornelli

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Twitter4JSearchTweets()
      The constructor of this class get a reference to the twitter class returned by the Twitter4JInstanceCreator

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SearchTweets(java.lang.String message)
      The SearchTweets method, take a message as a parameter and use it for the tweets search.
      void SearchUsers(java.lang.String message)
      The SearchUsers method, take a message as a parameter and use it for the tweets search.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Twitter4JSearchTweets

        public Twitter4JSearchTweets()
        The constructor of this class get a reference to the twitter class returned by the Twitter4JInstanceCreator

    • Method Detail

      • SearchTweets

        public void SearchTweets(java.lang.String message)
        The SearchTweets method, take a message as a parameter and use it for the tweets search. For each tweet found, it prints to the console the name of the user and the tweet text.
        Parameters:
        message: - keyword used for research

      • SearchUsers

        public void SearchUsers(java.lang.String message)
        The SearchUsers method, take a message as a parameter and use it for the tweets search. For each tweet found, it prints to the console the name of the user and the profile description.
        Parameters:
        message: - keyword used for research
